name: Standard Arm
infoText: This is the standard arm that comes with this model.

name: The Strongman Arm
infoText: The Strongman Arm part is designed for heavier jobs and heavy lifts. Both the arm and claws are made of a really tough steel that can withstand lots of force and high heatlevels. The claws, while sturdy, are at the same time thin which allows for more precision.
